Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions

Class PayResource

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.Action
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Actions.PayResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PayResourceBuyCard, PayResourceProduction
public class PayResource
extends Action
PayResource Class defines data and methods to complete a Client's request when paying for a production or a Development Card.

Attributes:

  • boolean "fromWarehouse": set to true if the payed resource comes from the Warehouse
  • int "depot": specifies which depot the chosen resource comes from (if it comes from the Warehouse)
  • ResourceType "resourceType": specifies which type of resource was chosen by the player (if the resource comes from the Strongbox)
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • isCorrect

      public boolean isCorrect() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Controls if the input sent to the server is correct by running the following checks:
      • if the resource comes from the Warehouse, depot index has to be between 0 and 4
      • if the resource comes from the Strongbox, the specified resourceType mustn't be of type NONE
      • if the resource comes from the Warehouse, the specified resourceType MUST be of type NONE
      Overrides:
      isCorrect in class Action
      Returns:
      true if the action's parameters are correct.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the ResourceTypes is equal to NONE.

    • canBeApplied

      public boolean canBeApplied​(ActionController actionController)
      Checks if the action is logically applicable by assuring that the depot chosen by the player is Active (if the resource comes from the Warehouse).
      Overrides:
      canBeApplied in class Action
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      true if the specified depot can actually be used.

    • doAction

      public java.lang.String doAction​(ActionController actionController) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Controls and executes the action on the Model.
      Overrides:
      doAction in class Action
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      "SUCCESS" if the action went right, another String if it went wrong.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • messagePrepare

      public MessageToClient messagePrepare​(ActionController actionController)
      This method is overridden in two other subclasses because the Server response to a payment action differs depending on if the player is paying for a Development Card or to activate a Production.
      Overrides:
      messagePrepare in class Action
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      Returns:
      null by default as it should be used in this SuperClass.

    • hasToPay

      protected PaymentMessage hasToPay​(ActionController actionController, boolean card)
      Protected method used by SubClasses to create a new PaymentMessage in case the player has not finished paying for a Development Cart or a Production.
      Parameters:
      actionController - Class used to compute Action messages coming from the Client.
      card - Boolean set to true if the player is buying a Card, false if he is starting a Production.
      Returns:
      A PaymentMessage MessageToClient type object.
